text.div:
• Include these codes as defined in http://unitsofmeasure.org
    CodeDisplay
    [lb_av][lb_av]
    [oz_av][oz_av]
    kgkg
    gg

name: Hl7VSWeightUnits
title: hl7VS-weightUnits
description: Value Set of codes of units of measure that are used to specify weight.
